name: Granny's House
description:
Story:

You left two and a half pairs of your lucky socks at Granny's house! This is a big no no, so get them back while Granny is still at bingo!

Controls:

Use WASD to move, and mouse to move the camera. Left click to use items, press P to pause, and press F to toggle Fullscreen. Hold shift to run, and hold spacebar to look behind you.
